doctor.name: Assoc. Prof. Dr. Bijoy Dutta
doctor.specialty: Cardiology (Heart Diseases, Hypertension & Rheumatic Fever) SpecialistClinical & Interventional Cardiologist
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr Bijoy Dutta was graduated from Dhaka Medical College in 2000. He passed MD in Cardiology from NICVD, Dhaka. He is a fellow of Society for Cardiovascular Angiography and Intervention- USA. Now he is working as Associate Professor of Cardiology at NICVD, Dhaka. He has done more than 4000 CAG, 1500 PTCA, 350 PPM implantation. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Malibagh. Practicing hour of Assoc. Prof. Dr. Bijoy Dutta at Labaid Diagnostic, Malibagh is 7pm to 10pm (Closed: Tues & Friday).

chamber.address: House # B65, Chowdhury Para, Malibagh, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Sahabuddin Khan
doctor.degree: MBBS (DMC), MCPS (Medicine), MD (Cardiology), Ph.D, MRCP (Ireland), FRCP (Ireland)

chamber.address: 150, Begum Rokeya Sarani, Senpara-Parbata, Mirpur-10, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Toufiqur Rahman Faruque
doctor.degree: MBBS (DMC), MD (Cardiology), FCPS (Medicine), FACC (USA), FACP (USA), FASE (USA),FSCAI (USA), FRCP (Glasgow & Edinburgh), FCCP (USA), FESC (Europe),FAHA (USA), FAPSIC (Singapore), FAPSC (Japan)
doctor.specialty: Cardiology, Medicine, Rheumatic Fever & Diabetes Specialist
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Toufiqur Rahman Faruque is a Cardiologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), MD (Cardiology), FCPS (Medicine), FACC (USA), FACP (USA), FASE (USA), FSCAI (USA), FRCP (Glasgow & Edinburgh), FCCP (USA), FESC (Europe), FAHA (USA), FAPSIC (Singapore), FAPSC (Japan). He is a Professor & Head of the Department (Cardiology) at National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Toufiqur Rahman Faruque at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh is 2pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu), 10am to 12pm (Friday).

chamber.address: Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka
